The dining room had a door that was rarely opened, a window that was always shut, and a chair that was reserved for the person who was about to die. Mrs Gilmour had died six months ago. Since then, the chair had remained vacant. However, on this particular day, the door creaked open, and a young man with a suitcase and a look
